>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/room/screen"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update the screen configuration of the room.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"width":{"type":"integer","example":1280,"description":"The width of the screen."},"height":{"type":"integer","example":720,"description":"The height of the screen."},"rate":{"type":"integer","example":30,"description":"The refresh rate of the screen."}},"title":"ScreenConfiguration"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Screen configuration updated successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"width":{"type":"integer","example":1280,"description":"The width of the screen."},"height":{"type":"integer","example":720,"description":"The height of the screen."},"rate":{"type":"integer","example":30,"description":"The refresh rate of the screen."}},"title":"ScreenConfiguration"}}}},"401":{"description":"The request requires user authentication.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string","description":"Detailed error message."}},"title":"ErrorMessage"}}}},"403":{"description":"The server understood the request, but refuses to authorize it.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string","description":"Detailed error message."}},"title":"ErrorMessage"}}}},"422":{"description":"Invalid screen configuration.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string","description":"Detailed error message."}},"title":"ErrorMessage"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
